name: baku
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the capital city of Azerbaijan, in the eastern part of the country: The real exchange rate has appreciated sharply, one reason why Baku is so expensive. Leaving Baku, the pipeline route itself heads north through Azerbaijan.
More examplesFewer examplesWe arrived in Baku the following morning.He lives in a small town 20 miles from Baku.On the streets of Baku, some Azerbaijanis question whether now is the right time to bid for the Olympics.Two oil refineries in downtown Baku will be scrapped and replaced with modern plants outside the city.
